trans-unit.source: ptemplate is a lightweight templating engine for Python, heavily inspired by Google’s ctemplate language. Like ctemplate, ptemplate strongly separates the application’s logic and presentation. At its heart, ptemplate is an extension of Python’s advanced string formatting facility – it extends the interpreter’s built-in formatters to provide a fast, expressive, content-agnostic templating system.
trans-unit.target: ptemplate is a lightweight templating engine for Python, heavily inspired by Google’s ctemplate language. Like ctemplate, ptemplate strongly separates the application’s logic and presentation. At its heart, ptemplate is an extension of Python’s advanced string formatting facility – it extends the interpreter’s built-in formatters to provide a fast, expressive, content-agnostic templating system.
